About

My name is Trent Mentink and I am a self-taught web developer experienced in crafting beautiful and intuitive, mobile-first websites. After graduating from Cal Poly with a business major, I decided I wanted to learn computer programming. This decision led me through several months of intensive self-study before ultimately starting my career as a web developer. I'm very passionate about what I do which is why I never stop learning and work hard everyday at mastering my craft. To read more about my work experience you can follow the link to my resume.

Projects

Whether it's freelace work for a client or experimenting with new techniques and technologies, I am always staying busy with personal projects. Here is some of my favorite work that I have done in the past. If you would like to see more, you can check out my github account. If you are interested in my services or have an idea for the next great app, please feel free to contact me below.

Artwork

"Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time." This quote by Thomas Merton embodies what I love about art. For me, drawing is a form of meditation that allows me to explore new ideas and visit places I have never been. Below is a collection of some of my favorite pieces of artwork. More images are available upon filtering. If you are interested in any prints you can contact me below.

Filter Artwork
